gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.properties
Interface PropertiesProvider

All Superinterfaces:
ResourceWrapper
All Known Implementing Classes:
PropertiesProviderImpl
public interface PropertiesProvider
extends ResourceWrapper

Properties provider. A properties object can contain any type of object that is accessible with a key.

Method Summary

Date getPropertyAsDate(String key)
                       throws UnexpectedException
Gets the date value of an input parameter.

Parameters:
key - String the property's name
Returns:
Returns the date represented by the input parameter.
Throws:
UnexpectedException - If the parameter value does not contain a valid date according to the system locale.
